features: 【Fortable Washing Machine】-The mini washer is equipped with a detachable 28.54in drain hose and easy to unfold, with a capacity of 6.5L. It can fold and store when not in use, takes up little space that it is an ideal choice for your apartment, RV, balcony, and camping trip

【Safe Water & Energy Saving】-Compared with the traditional household washing machine, this foldable washing machine only needs a small amount of water and detergent, can make small clothes clean and fresh, no need to spend too much time and money at the laundromat, and you have more rest time in the apartment

【Power Cleaning】-Bionic hand rub cleaning mode, full range of turbine cleaning work, to solve the problem of clothing mixing, very suitable for underwear, socks and other small clothes, to ensure skin health for the family

【One Key Multi-Function Control】-Three functions can be achieved at the touch of a button, with 1 mins, 5 mins, 10 mins modes. Regular semi-automatic cleaning mode, through high frequency vibration to accelerate the decomposition of stains emulsification, so that you can easily complete the cleaning or drying effect

【1 Year Warranty Service】 - We provide 1 year warranty service for all our products, if you have any questions, please contact us, contact email: 1366908598@qq.com, we will provide you with satisfactory service

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I wanted to love this but so disappointing
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Bought to use in the motorhome. Attempted to wash a pair of knee high socks and one pair of ladies panties. The lid does not fit, it is to large so as it agitates water was running down the side. In spin mode when the agitater changes directions the basket just flew off the base. You can see by how it attaches why this would happen. While spinning the whole "washer" moved around on my counter. Again I wanted to love this, but will be returning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super convenient for elderly with small items
reviews.reviewText: I do all of my parents laundry because their washer and dryer are downstairs. But my mom loves nightgowns and my dad always wears PJs pants. This is absolutely perfect for that. It sits nicely on the counter and the agitator spins and stops which allows you to move the item around if you need to. The clothes come out clean and smell great. It's easy to fill up and easy to empty. It's lightweight so they don't have any issues moving it around and folding it and keeping it out of sight when not being used. Absolutely love this!
